title: Why Dorsey is joining Musk in criticizing Twitter’s board
content:
It was the Easter weekend, and thankfully, the Elon Musk-Twitter saga took a break. But we finally got to hear something about recent developments from Jack Dorsey, Twitter’s co-founder, ex-CEO, and outgoing board member, who weighed in on the issue with some non-direct tweets. Some of them were directed toward the company’s board, and how it has operated over the years, and some of them talked about the potential decentralization of social media. While the Bitcoin evangelist doesn’t fully agree with Musk on how Twitter should be operated, there’s some similarity in their vision. Let’s see how their visions compare.…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Twitter
description: Jack Dorsey joined Elon Musk in criticizing the Twitter board over the weekend, but he had slightly different views Twitter' algorithms.
